inputs.remark: 缺少V3 助听器follow up和V4 听力辅助设备HAT follow up

logic_summary: Added V3 encounter: Hearing aid follow-up 2 weeks post-fitting (failure of HA trial) with device inspection and plan to switch to HATs.
Added V4 encounter: HAT follow-up 2 weeks later (success with HATs) including COSI outcomes.

history.present_illness: Follow-up 2 weeks post-fitting. Patient reported lack of benefit and retention issues. Hearing aids fell out multiple times and tether was disconnected. Misplaced devices for 4 days.
history.medical_psych_history: Daughter did not assist mother with devices, citing cultural respect for independence.
history.plan: Hearing aids returned for credit. Recommended HATs (Pocketalker, wireless TV headset, captioning phone).

tests.name: Device Inspection & Data Logging
tests.key_findings: Devices not properly inserted. Wrong battery size (312) used. Minimal usage recorded.

history.present_illness: Follow-up 2 weeks after HAT recommendation. Patient and daughter reported improvement in all areas.
history.outcome: Pocketalker improved conversation at home/church. Wireless headset improved TV enjoyment. Captioning phone improved telephone communication.

tests.name: COSI
tests.key_findings: Perceived improvement in all identified listening situations.
